server_side_token: <Input server side token to use Android client application, otherwise blank.>
client_side_token: <Input server side token to use Android client application, otherwise blank. long and random string is desirable.>

mail.mail_to: <E-mail addresses to notify events. For multiple addresses, split then by comma.
mail.server: E-mail server hostname or IP address
mail.subject: HomeRecorder detected event.
